tp:docstring.p: UserService object encapsulates the APIs to create or retrieve the dbus object of the user. Besides it emits signal when a user is added, deleted or updated.

signal.name: userAdded
signal.tp:docstring: Signal is emitted when user info is added to the user's account database

signal.name: userDeleted
signal.tp:docstring: Signal is emitted when user info is deleted from the user's account database

signal.name: userUpdated
signal.tp:docstring: Signal is emitted when user info is updated to the user's account database

method.name: getUser
method.tp:docstring: Gets the user dbus object based on UID

method.name: getUserByName
method.tp:docstring: Gets the user dbus object based on user name

method.name: getUserList
method.tp:docstring: Gets the list of the uids of the users

arg.name: types
arg.tp:docstring: Type of the users to be retrieved. If type is an empty string, all users are fetched. User type is first compared with usertype in gecos field. If gecos field for usertype does not exist, then all the users are considered as normal users other than system users which are filtered out based on system min and max uids.
